bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Letter from [Howard A. Kelly] to W.W. Norman, October 25, 1922

div1.p: [Kelly] requests official confirmation of the changes to be made in the new edition of “Walter Reed and Yellow Fever.“

div1.head: Letter from [Howard A. Kelly] to W.W. Norman, October 25, 1922
div1.p:
When I talked over with you the
matter of taking up the Walter Reed book, you agreed
to several minor changes in the text such as I in-
dicated would have to be made, to the additional
chapter on Gorgas, and to two other pictures. The
only addendum which was not then agreed upon was the
chapter on Doctor Sternberg and his picture. Will
you kindly let me know if this understanding is
satisfactory to you. I should like to have a mem-
orandum, stating what amount of attention the ad-
vertisement and distribution would have at your hands.

Will you also please inform me
if any special effort is being made to advertise and
distribute the Cyclopedia for the coming Christmas
season. I shall take up with you shortly the question
of your firm's continuing to handle the Cyclopedia.
